doc.title: The Fox and the Rabbit
doc.plot: A child rabbit is sent to school by his mother. On the way, he passes a carrot patch, which is actually a trap set by a hungry wolf. He remembers what his mother told him before he left; "Don't be late to school. And remember, don't play hookey.", so he decides to walk on by. While at school, the rabbit remembers the carrot patch he passed and begins to get anxious. He pretends to have the measels, and his teacher kicks him out of school. He returns to the carrot patch, and isn't aware that the wolf is wating for him...
